title: Oyabun

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, you may send a letter to one player, sending them any message under 100 words.
- Each night, when you send a letter, you may also send another object inside it which triggers additional effects at the end of the night. You can only send each object once:
1. Planted Bug - You learn of the target's role, and every whisper they've sent or received.
2. Bomb - Powerfully rampage at target house.
3. Severed Finger - Target is roleblocked tonight and blackmailed tomorrow.
4. Yakuza Sigil - Target is framed for the rest of the game. If they die tonight, they appear as the Oyabun in the graveyard and their will is replaced with one of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional kill
- Factional chat
- You appear innocent to investigations and come up as a random town role.
- Your letters are sent astrally, and neither they nor their objects can be traced back to you.

desc:
Post 4095
*The Oyabun, or literally "Foster Parent", is the family boss of the Yakuza.*
